Question
========

Suppose a class contains 40 students. Of these, 3 students are left-handed. The teacher wants to randomly select two students, each of whom must answer a question. What is the probability that two students chosen are chosen sequentially are both left-handed?

Answerlist
----------

* 3/40
* 3/1600
* 9/1600
* 6/1560

Solution
========
